summary: User requests a built-in error notification mechanism for workflow failures to integrate with external error tracking services like Bugsnag. The SDK maintainer recommends using interceptors instead and points to existing samples.
userImpact: Users cannot easily send workflow errors to external error tracking services without implementing custom solutions using interceptors.
proposedFix: Add an optional error_notifier parameter to Worker that accepts a class implementing a notify(exception) interface
workaround: Use interceptors to wrap workflow logic and send exceptions to external error tracking services
resolutionDetails: Maintainer closed as not an SDK issue, recommending interceptors as the intended approach for this use case
keyQuote: You should use interceptors for this which can wrap workflow logic... closing this issue since it's not an SDK issue
